metas.description: All the betting and race news for the 2015 County Handicap Hurdle at the Cheltenham Festival.

page.content:
Cheltenham Festival Day 4 Races - County Handicap Hurdle Odds

The County Handicap Hurdle is tucked away on day 4 of the Cheltenham Festival card however it is still a great renewal and will be eagerly anticipated as always in 2015. The race is associated with the great trainer Vincent O'Brien and it rarely disappoints with a decent price winner, the bookies have won this one recently with a 50/1 winner in 2009 with Silver Jaro and a 20/1 winner in 2011 with Thousand Stars.

County Handicap Hurdle - Click to Bet

14:05 Vincent O'Brien County Handicap Hurdle (Grade 3)

2.Sort It Out - E Harty - N Madden - 17/2
3.Quick Jack - A Martin - S Shortall - 8/1
4.Max Dynamite W Mullins - R Walsh - 14/1
5.Analifet - W Mullins - D Mulins - 33/1
25 Ran
